name: Coffee Dates
description: Coffee Dates is a passionately crafted visual novel about getting to know your oddball co-workers at a humble little coffee shop. Each one of them has their own unique ambitions that you'll get roped into, which only escalate in scale and weirdness as you progress. Enjoy our hand-crafted art style and expressive character animations. Play some mini-games between those long sessions of dialog reading. Ultimately, Coffee Dates is a lighthearted game designed to give you some good laughs and some wholesome feels.
